Posts.Content: Mar 11, 2012 11:01PM jofish420 wrote: I had a stereotactycal (sp) biopsy after my mammo came back with suspicious calcifications.  I am post menopausal..54.  I received my results over the phone.  I knew when I got the call that it wasn't good only becuase the nurse called and then said "the doctor needs to speak to you.".  He said that my biopsy results came back with "malignancies".  I then made an appt with him to discuss "my options".  I don't know exactly what these malignancies are yet.  I've been reading up on DCIS.  but I would only be guessing. It was a weird call..i didnt know what to say..or ask.
Posts.Title: How did you hear biopsy results--phone or appt? frazzledmom schoolmom
